snippet: A lawyer for Michael B. Hill said her client had seized the school in an effort to provoke the police into killing him in a “very misguided” suicide attempt.
abstract: Mentally ill Georgia man Michael B Hill is sentenced to 20 years in prison after his guilty plea to charges that included aggravated assault and burglary connected to his armed seizure of an elementary school in Decatur.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Michael B. Hill said her client had seized the school in an effort to provoke the police into killing him in a “very misguided” suicide attempt.
